name: Elemental Force
description:
The Team

Game Director-Muhammad Adeel

Programmer-Hassan Bahemia

Sound Engineer- Shaafie Abdulahi and Faizan Naeem

Concept Artist-Lauren Metcalf

Controls:

Player 1:

( W,A,S,D) To move 

F to shoot 

G to Dash

Player 2:

(Arrow Keys) To move 

L to shoot 

P to Dash

Lore:

In the land of Pixol, the king is close to death, the two twin brothers both have the right to the throne. However only one can be king so a battle will decide who shall be the new leader of Pixol.

Both Brothers have Elemental Powers ( One Ice, One Fire)

Extra Info:

Only level 1 has dashing abilities. 

Level 2 is also much slower.

We will also be updating the game so there is a 4 player mode in the future.
